tool_description: Unleash the power of GPT-4 and simplify integration with standard JSON responses.
title: Integrate AI

api_list.name: question_answering_question_answering__post
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://integrate-ai.p.rapidapi.com/question-answering/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "integrate-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
